Major_Arcs.title: King Guz and Alley's Debt Encounter
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around Alley's interaction with King Guz concerning an unpaid debt, setting up a humorous conflict early in the comic.

sub_scenes.title: King Guz's Rescue and Immediate Debt Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: King Guz is rescued by Alley, who immediately brings up an old debt, much to the King's chagrin and the woman's surprise.

narrative_arcs.title: King Guz's Wet Predicament and Unpaid Debt

Major_Arcs.title: Dinosaur Trade and New Dino Acquisition
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Alley's decision to trade in his old dinosaur, Dinny, for a newer, smaller model at Honest Zog's dealership.

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Age and Trade-in Idea
sub_scenes.description: Alley expresses frustration with Dinny's clumsiness, leading to the idea of trading him in for a newer dinosaur.

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Dealership and New Dino Acquisition
sub_scenes.description: Alley and an unnamed character visit Honest Zog's dealership, test drive a new dinosaur, and finalize the trade, including a farewell to Dinny.

narrative_arcs.title: Deal Sealed and Zog's Dino's Bite
Alley's Farewell and Mixed Feelings about Dinny
Departure with New Dino & Zog's Advice

Major_Arcs.title: Dinny's Re-evaluation and Rescue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Dinny's fate at the dealership, his challenging test ride, and Alley's decision to rescue him after realizing Dinny's past mistreatment.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Re-evaluation and Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Dinny is evaluated by potential buyers, has a disastrous test ride, and his roar leads to his recognition and Alley's rescue plan.

narrative_arcs.title: Unexpectedly Wild Test Ride on Dinny

Major_Arcs.title: Fishing Invitation and Argument with Coola
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Alley's attempt to invite Coola fishing and the subsequent argument that arises from a misunderstanding about her availability and Alley's perceived assumptions.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Invitation and Argument with Coola
sub_scenes.description: Alley invites Coola fishing, leading to a rejection, misunderstanding, accusation of being taken for granted, and a physical retaliation.

Major_Arcs.title: Fishing and Misogynistic Commentary
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents a thematic interlude focused on misogynistic thoughts expressed by various cavemen during fishing scenarios.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing and Misogynistic Commentary
sub_scenes.description: Various cavemen express stereotypical negative views about women, followed by a fishing conflict escalating into insults and a brief apology.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusations and Apology by the Riverbank

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Rivalry and Oola's Discovery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc revolves around romantic rivalry and jealousy, culminating in a discovery of romantic interest in Oola by another man.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Rivalry and Oola's Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Accusations of romantic competition lead to a reluctant investigation and the discovery of Oola receiving compliments from another caveman.

Major_Arcs.title: Misdirected Jealousy and Koko & Cherie
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts a violent outburst of jealousy based on mistaken identity, leading to a clarification and a tender romantic scene between Koko and Cherie.

sub_scenes.title: Misdirected Jealousy and Koko & Cherie
sub_scenes.description: A violent accusation of romantic betrayal is misdirected, leading to a tender scene of comfort and a realization of misunderstanding.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Strategy and Mentorship
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores different approaches to romance, with one caveman seeking advice on romantic techniques to compete for Oola's affection.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Strategy and Mentorship
sub_scenes.description: Advice on romantic approaches is exchanged, from avoiding violence to learning romantic techniques from a 'French' competitor.

Major_Arcs.title: Jealous Sabotage and Oola's Rejection
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts a jealous caveman's clumsy attempt to sabotage Koko's romantic gesture, resulting in public humiliation and rejection by Oola.

sub_scenes.title: Jealous Sabotage and Oola's Rejection
sub_scenes.description: A jealous caveman tries to sabotage Koko's romantic moment but is swiftly and harshly rejected by Oola.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Comedy and Cannibalism Misunderstanding
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc showcases a series of humorous romantic misunderstandings involving Koko and Oola, including accusations of theft and cannibalism.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Comedy and Cannibalism Misunderstanding
sub_scenes.description: Romantic interactions between Koko and Oola are comically misinterpreted, leading to accusations of theft and cannibalism, ultimately resolved through clarification.

narrative_arcs.title: Romantic Interlude and Loss of Control
Clarification of Affection and Misunderstood Kiss

Major_Arcs.title: Infidelity, Remorse, and Romantic Attempts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores themes of infidelity and its consequences, alongside attempts at romantic reformation and different styles of courtship.

sub_scenes.title: Infidelity, Remorse, and Romantic Attempts
sub_scenes.description: Accusations of infidelity, violent retribution, remorseful apologies, and declarations of romantic reformation are contrasted with polite courtship and male camaraderie.

narrative_arcs.title: Male Camaraderie and Complaint about Women

Major_Arcs.title: The "New Twist" Dance Craze
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc satirizes a dance craze, highlighting its unexpected negative consequences, social pressure to participate, and the painful attempts to learn it.

sub_scenes.title: The "New Twist" Dance Craze
sub_scenes.description: The 'New Twist' dance is introduced as a dangerous craze causing injuries and social pressure to participate, despite contrasting opinions on its appeal.

narrative_arcs.title: The Unfortunate Consequences of the New Twist
Encouragement and Dismissal of the New Twist
Social Pressure to Participate in the Twitch Party

sub_scenes.title: Painful Dance Lessons
sub_scenes.description: Humorous and painful dance lessons ensue as characters try to learn 'The Twitch', culminating in a name reveal.

sub_scenes.title: The Disastrous "Twitch" Party
sub_scenes.description: The 'Twitch' party results in chaos, public humiliation, and widespread incapacitation, revealing the dance's disastrous effects.

narrative_arcs.title: Post-Twitch Inquiry and Admission of Failure
Fleeing in Fear and Public Humiliation
Hospital Quiet and Watching the Aftermath

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel for Historical Research
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows a scholarly quest for firsthand historical information about 16th-century Spain using time travel technology.

sub_scenes.title: Time Travel for Historical Research
sub_scenes.description: Scholarly discussion leads to the idea of using time travel to research 16th-century Spain, culminating in a romantic scene witnessed in the past.

narrative_arcs.title: Scholarly Inquiry and Time Travel Suggestion

sub_scenes.title: The Time-Traveling Kiss
sub_scenes.description: A romantic kiss is interrupted by accidental time travel, bringing cave dwellers to the present.

narrative_arcs.title: Time Traveler's Successful Tuning and Observation
Romantic Kiss Interruption and Time Travel Activation
Time Travel and Accidental Kiss in the Present

sub_scenes.title: Resolving the Spain Time Travel Mishap
sub_scenes.description: Confusion in the present time lab is followed by explanations of the Spain assignment and the eventual return to ancient Spain, resolving the time travel mishap.

narrative_arcs.title: Confused in the Present Time Lab
Reassurance and Impending Return to Spain

Major_Arcs.title: Spanish Street Fight and the Matador
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts a humorous street fight in Spain, involving a misguided intervention and the revelation of a famous matador.

sub_scenes.title: Spanish Street Fight and the Matador
sub_scenes.description: A caveman arrives in Spain and misinterprets a street serenade, leading to a fight, intervention by a furious matador, and the arrival of a manager.

narrative_arcs.title: The Famous Don and the Disturbance

Major_Arcs.title: The Unconventional Bullfight
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc humorously depicts an unconventional bullfight, featuring a brute using a stone-age axe instead of traditional matador weapons.

sub_scenes.title: The Unconventional Bullfight
sub_scenes.description: An unconventional bullfight unfolds with a brute using a club, leading to a quick victory and arena acclaim.

narrative_arcs.title: Setting the Stage for an Unconventional Bullfight

Major_Arcs.title: Alley's Return and the Denied Kiss
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Alley's return from time travel, his anticipation of a promised kiss, and its humorous denial due to a jealous accusation.

sub_scenes.title: Alley's Return and the Denied Kiss
sub_scenes.description: Planning for Alley's return leads to a sarcastic welcome, a chaotic arrival, anticipation of a kiss, and its abrupt denial due to jealousy and interrogation.

Major_Arcs.title: King for a Day and its Rejection
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc satirizes the concept of 'King for a Day,' showing the humorous rejection of a temporary king by villagers.

sub_scenes.title: King for a Day and its Rejection
sub_scenes.description: A 'King for a Day' procession is interrupted, leading to a debate about the king's role, the appointment of a temporary king, and his immediate rejection by the villagers.

narrative_arcs.title: Debate on the King's Easy Life

Major_Arcs.title: Guz, Oompa, and the Ulcer Pills
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts a domestic conflict between Guz and Oompa, centered around ulcer pills mistaken for bon-bons and Oompa's strict treatment of Guz.

sub_scenes.title: Guz, Oompa, and the Ulcer Pills
sub_scenes.description: Guz enjoys ulcer pills thinking they are treats, is scolded by Oompa for dirty feet, and washes his feet while reflecting on Guz's need for vacations.

narrative_arcs.title: Guz's Lazy Indulgence and Bon-Bon Mishap
Broom Attack and Temporary King Plea

Major_Arcs.title: The Clam Dispute
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc revolves around a humorous dispute over found clams, escalating into accusations and physical fights, ultimately rendered moot by the clams' disappearance.

sub_scenes.title: The Clam Dispute
sub_scenes.description: A heated argument and physical fight erupt over found clams, leading to a suggestion to seek wise counsel, only to discover the clams are missing.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusations of Cheating and Fighting Over Money
Seeking Wise Counsel and Loss of Clams

Major_Arcs.title: King's Dinner and Troubles
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents a series of interconnected scenes depicting the King's life, from investigating disturbances to enjoying lavish meals and facing health-related and interpersonal conflicts.

sub_scenes.title: King's Dinner and Troubles
sub_scenes.description: The King orders investigation into a racket, observes a 'Wise Guy' being beaten, enjoys a dinosaur dinner, and faces a food fight related to his ulcer.

narrative_arcs.title: Investigating the Racket and the Wise Guy's Beating
Fine Advisor's Meal and Self-Serving Thoughts

sub_scenes.title: King's Ulcer and Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: Concern about the King's ulcer leads to a parsley offering, followed by a scene of regret and a sudden act of playful betrayal turning violent.

Major_Arcs.title: Apology, Royal Liberation, and Ruler Measurement
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents three distinct scenarios: an apology for injury, liberation from royalty, and a humorous proposition to become a ruler that turns into a measuring task.

sub_scenes.title: Apology, Royal Liberation, and Ruler Measurement
sub_scenes.description: An apology for injury, a declaration of liberation from royalty, and a ruler proposition that turns out to be a measuring task are depicted in separate, quick scenes.

Major_Arcs.title: The Barberous Act
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells a short, humorous story about a barber who uses forceful methods to acquire customers, starting with a prophecy and ending in a barber shop.

sub_scenes.title: The Barberous Act
sub_scenes.description: A prophecy about a bearded stranger leads to Ooola encountering a barber who forcibly 'abducts' a customer to drum up business for his parlor.

narrative_arcs.title: The Barberous Act and the Bearded Stranger

Major_Arcs.title: Time Machine Experiment and Roman Soldier
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the narrative by returning to the time travel theme, showing a time machine experiment resulting in the unexpected arrival of a Roman soldier and subsequent technical difficulties.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Experiment and Roman Soldier
sub_scenes.description: A time machine experiment to bring someone from the past to the present results in the surprising arrival of a Roman soldier and a subsequent machine malfunction.

narrative_arcs.title: Time Machine Experiment and Unexpected Visitor
